subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution . China (Fujian, Guangdong, Guangxi, Hainan, Yunnan, Xizang, Taiwan ), India , Japan , Thailand , Indonesia .

Host plants.
Castanopsis
spp .,
Cyclobalanopsis neglecta
( Fagaceae ),
Meliosma rigida
( Sabiaceae ) and
Alnus cremastogyne
( Betulaceae ).
